title: (x) Autoprime company font - Bodega Sans Oldstyle {Rainer, Stephen}
content:
Hello all

I’ve come across this curious font that I’d have uses for but fail to recognize. Hours of searching through the internet didn’t yield any results, so maybe someone here could help?

Thanks in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [autoprime.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071114011905/http:/typophile.com/files/autoprime.jpg) | 20.39 KB |

 [‹ (x) The Anti Pizza Face script on shirt - Ariston {Brett J, Patricia}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071114011905/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38137 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) type in Mitsubishi logo - custom design {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071114011905/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38124 "Go to next forum topic")
author: LtCannonfodder

comments.content: Hmm, similar to a slanted [Bodega Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20071114011905/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/bodega-sans/) on a line.

It’s a horrendously obliqued and [squooshed](http://web.archive.org/web/20071114011905/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/squoosh) [Bodega Sans Oldstyle](http://web.archive.org/web/20071114011905/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font_bureau/bodega_sans_light_oldstyle/?sample_text=autopr%C4%B1me&sample_size=144&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1).
